You're using a Personal Knowledge Container (PKC) developed by ''inblock.io assets GmbH'' under GPLv3 License.
The PKC acts as a Data Vault.<br>

'''Data Vault'''<br>
is a software with strong architecture and measures to keeping data assets safe. This is achieved through encryption, strong authentication and restrictive access to keep data private by default.<br>

Data Vaults can be used for governing trustworthy data:<br>
Personal files and notes, like medical records, identity claims, certificates, legal agreements and more.<br>
It can be used as a notary service to protect intellectual property, proof data integraty and ownership.
